name: Super Metronic
author: Anton Shulga

sections.description: Plugin “Super Metronic” allows You to create portlets using the functionality Metronic and put them on the user page of your website using shortcodes [smf_portlets].
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘super-metronic’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

That’s all!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire ‘super-metronic’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

That’s all!

A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.

What about foo bar?

Answer to foo bar dilemma.

How to uninstall “Super Metronic”?

Simple deactivate it through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: To add the functionality from Metronic
description: Plugin “Super Metronic” allows You to create portlets using the functionality Metronic and put them on the user page of your website using shortcodes [smf_portlets].

upgrade_notice.1.1.1: Add validation for form fields and data before writing them to the database.
upgrade_notice.1.0: This version fixes a security related bug.
